DOC.brief_title: A Trial Comparing Sequential Addition Insulin Aspart Versus Further Dose Increase With Insulin Degludec/Liraglutide Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus , Previously Treated With Insulin Degludec/Liraglutide Metformin Need Further Intensification
